screenReaderLabel.description: Text to output only to screen readers

renderTooltipContent.description: Text to render in the tooltip shown on hover/focus

renderIcon.description: An icon or function that returns an icon

status.description: Toggles the `aria-pressed` attribute on the button (`true` if `pressed`; `false` if `unpressed`)

as.description: The element to render as the component root; `button` by default

interaction.description: Specifies if interaction with `ToggleButton` is `enabled`, `disabled`, or `readonly`

elementRef.description: Provides a reference to `ToggleButton`'s underlying HTML element

onClick.description: Callback fired when the `ToggleButton` is clicked

color.description: The color in which to display the icon

isShowingTooltip.description: By default, the tooltip will show on hover/focus. Use this prop if you need to override that behavior.

mountNode.description: An element or a function returning an element to use as the mount node

placement.description: The placement of the tooltip in relation to the button

constrain.description:
The parent in which to constrain the tooltip.
One of: 'window', 'scroll-parent', 'parent', 'none', an element,
or a function returning an element.

title: ToggleButton
